@graph.name: Artur Taszakowski
@graph.description: I'm a biologist interested in the biodiversity of insects. My focus is primarily on true bugs (Hemiptera: Heteroptera) diversity and evolution, and I carry out faunistic, taxonomic and morphological research. I'm interested in such issues as the diversity and ultramorphology of sensory organs; morphology, taxonomy and systematics of Isometopinae and Cylapinae (Miridae); faunistics, distribution, biology and origin of heteropterofauna of Poland.
